attributes.action: Be declared fit to drive HGVs like in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details: I think it's unfair that people with minor epilepsy like myself cannot drive HGVs until going 10 years without haveing a seizure and not taking medication in said time period. I think it would be best if we do the same as Northern Ireland where you just have be declared fit to drive HGVs by your Doctor weather your on tablets or not.
